plot: George Laidlaw, a popular student, is looking forward to the upcoming school year. He's nominated for class secretary and his best friend, Tom Bertran, is almost certain to win the class ...
title: What Do You Think About... Being Different
plot_es: George Laidlaw, a popular student, is looking forward to the upcoming school year. He's nominated for class secretary and his best friend, Tom Bertran, is almost certain to win the class ...
original_name: What Do You Think About... Being Different
